channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM Corporation -- Sterling B2B Integrator
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM Corporation -- Sterling B2B Integrator

item.title: CVE-2016-0210|2024-08-05T22:08:13.353Z -- ibm%20corporation -- sterling%20b2b%20integrator
item.description: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator Standard Edition could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. By allowing HTTP OPTIONS method, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted query to a vulnerable server running to cause the server to disclose sensitive information in the HTTP response.
